analysis.key_quote: This change will allow a U.S. President to use job security as a threat against the federal government publishing accurate data that the President deems to be 'intentionally subverting Presidential directives.'
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern that the proposed rule would politicize the civil service by allowing the President to threaten job security to influence the accuracy of economic data, which opposes the integrity of scientific and objective reporting.
